entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of rain showers or flurries. Low minus 2. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of rain showers or flurries changing to 30 percent chance of flurries after midnight. Wind becoming northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 except gusting to 70 along parts of the coast overnight. Low minus 2. Wind chill minus 9 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM ADT Tuesday 4 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 2. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries in the morning. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 except gusting to 70 along parts of the coast in the morning and early in the afternoon. Wind becoming light in the afternoon. Temperature steady near minus 2. Wind chill minus 9 in the morning and minus 4 in the afternoon. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:00 AM ADT Tuesday 4 April 2023
